title: Expedition! The Magical City of Tokyo!
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>So you’ve made it, Maki!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>That’s my line. So you’ve made it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>....Kukuku, today, I shall have you accompany me with my reconnaissance of this magical city....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Magical city? Aah, you mean that kind of magic, huh. Haven’t you been reading too much manga?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Kuukuku! Well, I guess it can’t be helped that a normal human wouldn’t understand.... But, this Yohane can feel it. There’s power swirling in this magical city of Tokyo....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Well, I don’t really mind<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>First of all, we’re going to the shrine that protects this magical city of Tokyo. There is tremendous power that lies dormant there that’s resonating with me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Where?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>The shrine Nozomi is helping. There’s an item there that increases magical power. I heard about it from Shioriko, she said it was delicious. And umm....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Geez. If you wanted to drink sweet sake, just say so from the beginning. Let’s go!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
